readable.title: 3091916691_b1c96669c6
readable.content: A man in a bright pink shirt shakes the hand of a bearded man in a saffron shirt . A man in a pink shirt stands next to a man in orange . Three men stand around in bright solid colored shirts and colorful hats . Three smiling men in brightly-colored shirts . Two men shaking hands and smiling at the camera , while a third man stands behind them .
